name: MULTY
0:
”Alexa, ask Zyxel Multy to turn on WiFi light”
”Alexa, ask Zyxel Multy to test Internet speed”
”Alexa, ask Zyxel Multy to check my network saftey status”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zyxel multy
des:
Zyxel and Alexa allows you to use your voice to control your Multy's WiFi. All you need is to have a registered account with Multy and link it up with Alexa. Here are some voice commands you can use with Multy and Alexa:

 1. Alexa, ask Zyxel Multy to turn off guest WiFi
 2. Alexa, ask Zyxel Multy to test Internet speed
 3. Alexa, ask Zyxel Multy to turn on WiFi light
 4. Alexa, ask Zyxel Multy to turn off WiFi light
 5. Alexa, ask Zyxel Multy to pause the Internet
 6. Alexa, ask Zyxel Multy to check my network saftey status

To enable Amazon Alexa with Zyxel Multy:
1. Download the Multy app.
2. Open the Multy app and register a myZyxelCloud account
3. Login Multy app.
4. Complete the setup.
5. Link myZyxelCloud account with Alexa.
